responseText:
Ah, a fresh face! Welcome to Bonfire.

While many of my kin turn their crafts to stone or to war, never overlook the comforts of a warm hearth-fire and a full belly, and nothing in this world comes without a bit o' labor first. Am I right?

Sometimes a warm meal might as well be a wish in the wind, if you've got nothing to cook up! That's why I farm.
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Farming_Tama_5_Response
